title: #485 Escape Tapes with Big Jay Oakerson
itunes:title: Escape Tapes with Big Jay Oakerson
description:
Out on the fire escape with Big Jay Oakerson on a New York summer night. This is an interesting one everybody. Big Jay Oakerson came to sit with me on the fire escape of my old studio and we talked mostly about how we feel about people looking into our windows from the street. I say if you leave your blinds open it's fair game. 

 

Get tickets to see Ari & Big Jay in Las Vegas September 21st - one night only!

 

For more Ari: https://www.arishaffir.com/

For more Big Jay: https://linktr.ee/bigjayoakerson 

 

The Music:

Andrew McMahon - Fire Escape

Miranda Lambert - Fire Escape

OK, Go - No Sign Of Life

Presidents of the USA - Meanwhile Back in the City

 

Thanks to our sponsors!

Use code "Ari" for 5% off at 3Chi.com

Head to YoKratom.com home of the $60 Kilo!

Check out the COOLEST pipes out there at TheFreezePipe.com and use code "Ari" for 10% off your entire order!
